num0: The Shard: Climber reported and three men arrested.
num1: A 21-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of trespass after a person was seen climbing The Shard building in central London.
num2: London Fire Brigade and the ambulance service also attended, and a number of cordons were put in place.
num3: Two other men were detained on suspicion of causing public nuisance, the Met said.
num4: Metropolitan Police officers were called to the 1,017ft-tall (310m) skyscraper at 05:38 BST.
